title: 의문사 + to부정사 — What/How/Where to do
intent: 의문사 + to부정사로 방법, 선택, 계획을 간결하게 묻고 답한다.
lexset: know, learn, decide, choose, find out, figure out, remember, forget, understand, explain
traps: 의문사 + to 구조(What to do vs What I should do)
동사 선택(know how to vs know to how ✗)
to 생략 금지(how do vs how to do)

seeds.en: I don't know what to do.
Tell me how to do it.
Have you decided where to go?
Let me know when to meet.
I don't know who to ask.
I'm thinking about which one to choose.
I want to learn how to cook.
I need to decide where to live.
I don't know what to wear.
I'll tell you how to get there.
